data.title: Location & Directions
data.meta_description: Zoku Paris is located in the 17th arrondissement right next to the Tribunal de Paris. Get car and public transport directions here.
data.text:
From Orly Airport

Walk for 5 minutes to the Aéroport d’Orly Metro station and take Metro 14 (Direction Saint-Denis – Pleyel) to Porte de Clichy. Take the Exit 5 – Tribunal de Paris, turn around and we’re just on the other side of the street. Enter and take the elevator up to the 8th floor!

From CDG Airport

Get the RER B train (Direction Massy-Palaiseau) to Chatelet Les Halles. Walk for 4 minutes to the Châtelet Metro station and take line 14 (Direction Mairie de Saint-Ouen) to Porte de Clichy. Walk down Avenue de la Porte de Clichy for a few minutes, and you’ll see us on the right side of the street.

From Gare du Nord

Coming from Gare du Nord and want to take public transport? Grab a ticket and catch Bus 54 (Direction Gabriel Peri-Metro) to Porte de Clichy station. Walk for just a few minutes, et voilà, you’ll see us on your right hand side!

Located in the 17th arrondissement, Zoku Paris is located next to the trendy Batignolles neighborhood. Our neighborhood is the perfect hub to get to main sites in Paris, and is located near many local business headquarters. Known for its trendy bars and cute parks, this is the place where the city’s artists, musicians, and journalists dwell.

Offering rooftop views in a less touristic part of Paris, we’re the perfect place to rest your head and grab a bite to eat after an adventurous day about town. We’re a 10-minute metro ride to the iconic Arc de Triomphe and other historical sites.
